EmailTemplate.name: Email Banner AND Photo Overlay
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VinSolutions Email Banner and Photo Overlay - {!Project_Piece__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
As part of the package you recently purchased, we will also be working on your email banner and photo overlay. Please see attached for some examples.
Email Banner and Photo Overlay The email banner will be your email header used with all email correspondence, while the photo overlay will appear on the primary photo of your vehicle photos in your inventory gallery (seen on third party sites and/or your website.)
1. Which of the attached examples would you like us to use for the email banner?
2. Which of the attached examples would you like us to use for the photo overlay?
If we do have the client’s logo on file:
3. Attached is the logo we have on file. Please confirm that this is the current logo that you would like to use.
If we do not have the client’s logo on file:
3. We currently do not have your logo on file. Please provide the most current version of your logo.
4. Please verify the following information you wish to display on your email banner and photo overlay:
Phone Number: {!Account.Phone}
Website URL: {!Project_Piece__c.Dealer_s_Web_Address__c}
Address: {!Project_Piece__c.Project_Shipping_Address__c}
5. Is there a vehicle you would like to be featured on the email banner? Please provide year, make, and model.
6. And lastly, what specific colors would you like us to use, if you have a preference? Please limit to three.
Thank you for your time!
